release.action: Added final modifier to reference implementation classes. Updated to latest container hooks.

Changed the target XML namespace of the textschluessel.xsd schema from http://jdtaus.org/banking/xml to http://jdtaus.org/banking/xml/textschluessel. Additionally fixed wrong schemaLocation in textschluessel.xml.

Updated class RITextschluessel to fall back to either an english short description or a default description for properties key and extension if the language given by the default locale is not supported.
Updated class RITextschluessel to use the new property defaultLanguage from the container model instead of the hardcoded english default language. Updated the POM removing hardcoded signing aliases.
